hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Habibah daughter of Jahsh: Ikrimah said: Umm Habibah daughter of Jahsh had a prolonged flow of blood. The Prophet (ﷺ) commanded her to refrain (from prayer) during her menstrual period; then she should wash and pray, if she sees anything (which renders ablution void) she should perform ablution and pray

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَذْكُرِ الْوُضُوءَ إِلاَّ عِنْدَ الْحَدَثِ
chapter.eng-name: Those Who Did Not Mention The Wudu' Except If It Was Nullified
